title: Relates to registration of street rods and custom vehicles
summary: Creates a 24/7 sobriety pilot program in up to ten counties to be determined by the superintendent of police; requires persons convicted of certain DWI offenses in such counties and sentenced to probation to submit to twice daily chemical testing; makes an appropriation therefor.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to registration of street rods and custom vehicles
